abstract: Top stories in the regional press this week.
snippet: Top stories in the regional press this week.
lead_paragraph: Himachal Pradesh: More than 250 deities will grace the annual procession at this year's Kullu Dussehra celebrations in Himachal Pradesh, part of the weeklong festivities in the Kullu Valley. Two deities have been banned, though, since their devotees demanded a special place of honor in the procession (The Times of India).Jharkhand: The state plans to construct a new capital city called New Ranchi on about 27,000 acres of land (Prabhat Khabar).
